channel.title: bob's rugby world cup - Entries tagged scotland

item.title: Prediction: Scotland v Argentina
item.description: A win by 20 points for Argentina. Scotland may stifle them but they should still win

item.title: Result: Argentina 19 - Scotland 13
item.description: Scotland came close at the end there. The kick was probably the wrong choice. At least it made sure all 4 quarter-finals were exciting and tense to the end. Roll on the semis.
